definition: threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams

sentences.english: Four hours on the tennis court fagged me out.
sentences.chinese: 在网球场上的四个小时令我精疲力尽语源。

sentences.english: The tennis player was so annoyed that he belted the ball right out of the court.
sentences.chinese: 那个网球手恼怒地用力一挥把球打到网球场外去。

sentences.english: Golf courses and tennis courts abound on this 96-mile island in the stream.
sentences.chinese: 在这个96英里的小岛上，遍布着高尔夫和网球场。

sentences.english: Eight courts in total, with lighting facility.
sentences.chinese: 共有八面网球场，附有夜间照明设备。

sentences.english: They marked out the tennis court with white paint.
sentences.chinese: 他们用白漆标出了网球场的界线。

sentences.english: The tennis courts rolled easily after the shower.
sentences.chinese: 阵雨后网球场容易碾平。

sentences.english: They built sprawling houses complete with swimming pools, tennis courts and dance floors.
sentences.chinese: 他们建造了绵延的豪宅，拥有游泳池，网球场和舞厅。

sentences.english: Still have the open-air tennis court and the interior cricket room.
sentences.chinese: 还有露天网球场和室内板球室。

sentences.english: Its compact grounds contain a tennis court and a croquet lawn .
sentences.chinese: 它紧凑的外场地包括一个网球场和一个槌球草坪。

sentences.english: Badminton courts and swimming pool are deep in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 在园林深处设有网球场和羽毛球场及游泳池。

sentences.english: There are enough alveoli in just one lung to cover an area roughly the size of a tennis court.
sentences.chinese: 一个肺叶里的肺泡就足够覆盖住网球场大小的面积。

sentences.english: There is also an oceanfront tennis court and coastal gardens.
sentences.chinese: 堡内还有滨海网球场和海边花园。

sentences.english: The court was in a meadow out on the New Antonia road.
sentences.chinese: 网球场位于新安东尼亚路旁的一块草地上。

sentences.english: He met her on the tennis court.
sentences.chinese: 他与她在网球场上相遇。

sentences.english: By the way, can you lend me ten bucks for a cab to the courts?
sentences.chinese: 说归说，你可以借我十块搭出租车到网球场吗？
